title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Language Leadership Development Through Online Project-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners complete three or more online project submissions through collaboration with team members within six months.
Learners improve language communication skills by over 20% in a PBL environment (based on pre- and post-assessments).
Learners generate meaningful interaction records at least twice weekly using an integrated Moodle-Facebook platform.
Learners demonstrate creative problem-solving abilities through project execution and achieve a peer evaluation score of 4.0/5.0 or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
